enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
sentences: The AWG plenary convened briefly on Tuesday afternoon.
AWG Chair Charles reported that delegates had not agreed on draft conclusions (FCCC/KP/AWG/2007/L.6).
The AWG agreed on text requesting the Secretariat to organize the AWG meetings in conjunction with other meetings and activities under the Convention and Protocol.
AWG Chair Charles indicated he would continue informal consultations and reconvene the AWG plenary in the coming days.

Outstanding issues included whether to reference paragraph numbers in the report from the first part of AWG 4, or to insert language on the need for global emissions to peak within 10-15 years and be reduced to well below half of 2000 levels by the middle of the century; and on the 25-40% indicative range of emissions reductions by 2020.
In addition, some of the AWG tasks for its sixth, seventh and eighth sessions remained in brackets.
Delegates approved the draft outline of the report (FCCC/KP/AWG/2007/L.5).
